forceUpdatePrice(uint256,uint256).details: Skips deviation check, resets EMA to new price

params.sizeDelta: Size of trade (positive = buy/long, negative = sell/short)

setUseIndex(uint256,bool).details: When enabled, updatePriceFromIndex() should be used instead of updatePrice()

updatePriceFromIndex(uint256).details: Triggers index calculation, then applies EMA smoothing

forceUpdatePrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Force update price (admin bypass for stale/deviated prices)

getExecutionPrice(uint256,int256).notice: Calculate execution price with slippage for a trade

getMarkPrice(uint256).notice: Get current mark price for a market

getPriceData(uint256).notice: Get all price data for a market

previewPriceFromIndex(uint256).notice: Preview what the price would be if updated from index

setUseIndex(uint256,bool).notice: Enable/disable probability index for a market

updatePriceFromIndex(uint256).notice: Update price by pulling from ProbabilityIndex
